name: Wallet4Agent MCP Server
description: Wallet4Agent MCP Server provides decentralized and regulated identity tools for AI Agents, Companies, and Users — powered by DIDs, Verifiable Credentials (SD-JWT & W3C JSON-LD), OIDC4VCI issuance, OpenID4VP verification, and Linked Verifiable Presentations.

auth.description: Send Authorization: Bearer <token> to authenticate with the MCP server.

tools.name: create_identity
tools.description: Generate a Decentralized Identifier (DID) for the agent and create a new wallet to store agent verifiable credentials

owner_login.description: Google email, Github login, personal wallet DID

tools.name: get_data
tools.description: Get token for dev and agent

tools.name: request_attestation
tools.description: Request the verifiable credential which is offered and store it in the wallet

agent_id.description: Agent decentralized identifier. Use did:web:wallet4agent:demo for testing and demo.

tools.name: get_supported_verification_scopes
tools.description: Return supported scopes, the claims each scope returns, and available verifier profiles.

tools.name: start_verification
tools.description: Create a wallet request as a QR code image or deeplink.

tools.name: poll_verification
tools.description: Poll current status for a session; returns structured status and redacted wallet_data.

tools.name: revoke_verification_flow
tools.description: Acknowledge cleanup for a session id (back-end TTL handles actual expiration).
